name: Vinyl "Studded" Clutch
description:
Made from quality black vinyl fabric. Crafted into this dainty and chic handbag. There's always a surprise of what sexy lining will be inside. Of coarse you can also send me any special requests ;)  Great for a evening out on the town or on a casual date. Just enough space for your essentials but unique and practical at the same time. Studded with gold round flat studs. Various designs available including but not limited to: "Cross", "Siri", "Heart", "Skull", Single Initial, Outlined, and "Dotted". Send custom design ideas to shoprigorpanache@gmail.com.

The clutch shown in the photo is the "Siri" design

name: Fabric Button Earrings
description: These dainty pieces are designed and hand made by myself, and are the perfect little earrings. They are light weight and very chic. They come in size 1/8 of an inch or 2.2 cm (about the size of a nickel). Great for a casual look during the day or for an added simple elegance for night! Set on nickel-free gold plated posts and clear stoppers. Choose from my selection of designs or place a CUSTOM order! Send your ideas to shoprigorpanache@gmail.com.

name: CUSTOM Denim Clutch
description:
Made from 100% cotton denim and 100% cotton fabric lining. Constructed using a zipper closure. Great for a night or as a signature piece! No one will have a bag quite like yours. The lining inside is always a pleasant and complimentary surprise. Feel free to send me your ideas for designs at shoprigorpanache@gmail.com.  This clutch comes in plain denim, bleached denim, dyed solid color denim, or bleached & dyed denim. Customize your own Denim Clutch or choose from my selection of designs. Measurements: 13.5in X 9.5in.

Choose any color! 
Lining fabric choices are endless!

***Denim Clutch Shown in Picture is Bleached!

**********PLEASE READ: Email your custom design ideas and color choices to shoprigorpanache@gmail.com once your order is placed. Email before hand for any clarifications!
